alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 06 at 11:50PM EDT until September 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heat indices values in the mid-90s expected. * WHERE...Western and Central Hillsborough, Merrimack, Sullivan, Cheshire, Eastern Hillsborough, and Interior Rockingham Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates as this heat has potential to persist through the remainder of the week.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates as this has potential to persist through much of this week.

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
